pros: It is heartening to see an organization dedicated to empowering young minds with the tools they need to succeed in today's world. The resources and opportunities they provide are invaluable, and they make all the difference in helping students achieve their full potential.
cons: Increase transparency: Consider sharing more about your program and strategies. Providing details about the number of students you reach, how you measure success, and how you allocate resources can help to build trust and increase donor engagement.
